description: Single source of truth for all product configuration. Read by: website product-selector.js, stripe-webhook.js, Agent pricing.py, Agent etsy.py

metal.name: Metal Print
metal.description: Direct print on aluminum. Vibrant colors, exceptional durability, no glass needed.
metal.archivalRating: 60+ years (ChromaLuxe tested by Wilhelm Imaging Research)
metal.careInstructions: Soft microfiber cloth or damp cloth with non-ammonia cleaner

hd.name: ChromaLuxe HD Gloss
hd.description: Dye-sublimation on ChromaLuxe panel. Ultra-vivid colors, scratch-resistant, ultra-gloss finish. The gold standard for fine art photography on metal.

al.name: Brushed Aluminum
al.description: UV print on brushed aluminum. Natural metallic grain shows through light areas, creating a unique industrial aesthetic. Best for high-contrast images.

alw.name: White Matte Metal
alw.description: White-coated aluminum with sophisticated matte finish. True-to-life colors without metallic interference. Elegant gallery presentation.

hds.name: ChromaLuxe Silver Gloss
hds.description: HD sublimation on silver base panel. Metallic shimmer combined with sublimation quality. Creates a luminous, shifting effect with viewing angle.

standoff.name: Standoff Posts
standoff.description: 4 polished aluminum posts at corners. Floats print approximately 1 inch from wall. Modern, gallery-style presentation.

backfloat.name: Back Float Frame
backfloat.description: Hidden aluminum frame mounted to back of print. Creates clean floating appearance from the front with no visible hardware.

frenchcleat.name: French Cleat
frenchcleat.description: Heavy-duty angled bracket system. Distributes weight evenly. Recommended for prints larger than 36 inches or in high-traffic areas.

none.name: No Mounting Hardware
none.description: Print ships without hanging hardware. Choose this only if you have your own mounting solution.
none.warning: This print will ship without any way to hang it on a wall.

canvas.name: Canvas Print
canvas.description: Museum-quality 410g/m² fine art canvas (70% cotton, 30% polyester). Acid-free, archival grade. Printed with Epson UltraChrome GS3 nine-color ink system.
canvas.careInstructions: Dust with soft brush. Avoid direct sunlight and high humidity.

c15.name: Gallery Wrap 1.5"
c15.description: Canvas stretched on premium 1.5-inch wooden frame. Substantial gallery presence. The professional choice for fine art display.

c075.name: Slim Wrap 0.75"
c075.description: Canvas stretched on 0.75-inch frame. Slimmer profile, lighter weight. More affordable option that still looks great.

rolled.name: Rolled Canvas (Giclée)
rolled.description: Unframed archival canvas shipped rolled in a protective tube. You provide your own stretcher bars or framing. Largest size option available.
rolled.shortDescription: Rolled in tube, you frame it
rolled.warning: Ships unframed. You will need to stretch or frame this canvas yourself.

semigloss.name: Semi-Gloss Varnish
semigloss.description: Protective semi-gloss varnish. Richer blacks, subtle sheen, scratch-resistant. The most popular choice for photography on canvas.

matte.name: Matte Varnish
matte.description: Fine art matte varnish. Deep color saturation with zero reflections. Museum-standard presentation for gallery settings.

knife.name: Knife Varnish (Textured)
knife.description: Manually applied textured varnish creating visible brushstroke-like texture. Gives the canvas a hand-painted, impasto appearance.

silver.name: Silver Canvas
silver.description: Metallic iridescent finish printed on silver-coated canvas. Light-reactive shimmer effect that shifts with viewing angle.

mirrorimage.name: Mirror Wrap
mirrorimage.description: Mirrors the photo edges around the frame sides. No cropping of the main image area. Most popular choice.

gallerywrap.name: Gallery Wrap
gallerywrap.description: Extends the image around the sides of the frame. Slight cropping of the visible image area.

solidcolor.name: Solid Color Border
solidcolor.description: Solid color edges. You choose the color. Clean, defined edge that frames the image.

acrylic.name: Acrylic Print
acrylic.description: Edge-to-edge UV print on optically pure acrylic (99.9%). Stunning color depth and luminous clarity. UV-cured ink at 1200×1200 DPI.
acrylic.careInstructions: Soft microfiber cloth or damp cloth with non-ammonia cleaner (e.g., Windex)

da16.name: Acrylic 3/16"
da16.description: Standard thickness acrylic with excellent optical depth. The recommended choice for most prints. Substantial feel without excessive weight.

da8.name: Acrylic 1/8"
da8.description: Slim, lightweight acrylic. Budget-friendly option that still delivers vibrant colors and clarity. Ideal for smaller prints or grouped displays.

ac220.name: Acrylic 1/4"
ac220.description: Premium thickness with maximum depth effect. Rich, jewel-like luminosity. A statement piece.

a38.name: Acrylic 3/8"
a38.description: Ultra-thick premium acrylic. Maximum perceived depth and substantial weight. For collectors who want the ultimate acrylic experience.

ng8.name: Non-Glare Acrylic 1/8"
ng8.description: Satin matte finish that reduces reflections while preserving clarity. Ideal for bright rooms, near windows, or under direct lighting.

standoff.name: Standoff Posts
standoff.description: 4 polished aluminum posts at corners. Floats print approximately 1 inch from wall. The most popular choice for acrylic.

backfloat.name: Back Float Frame
backfloat.description: Hidden aluminum frame on back. Clean floating appearance from front.

frenchcleat.name: French Cleat
frenchcleat.description: Heavy-duty angled bracket. Recommended for large or heavy prints.

none.name: No Mounting Hardware
none.warning: This print will ship without any way to hang it on a wall.

paper.name: Fine Art Paper
paper.description: Archival giclée prints on premium paper. Printed with Epson SureColor, UltraChrome GS3 nine-color ink system at 300 DPI.
paper.careInstructions: Handle by edges only. Frame behind glass for protection. Avoid direct sunlight.

art.name: Fine Art Matte
art.description: Premium archival-quality neutral white paper. Instant-dry coating, fingerprint-resistant surface. The museum standard for fine art reproduction.

satin.name: Satin Photo Paper
satin.description: Perfect balance between color vibrancy and minimal glare. Versatile all-around paper for photography.

glossphoto.name: Glossy Photo Paper
glossphoto.description: Resin-coated with soft glossy surface. Classic photographic reproduction with vibrant colors and sharp detail.

pearl.name: Pearlescent Metallic
pearl.description: High-gloss metallic paper with subtle shimmer. Exceptionally rich and vibrant. A middle ground between matte and high-gloss metal prints.

paper.framingNote: Paper prints ship rolled in a protective tube. Frame behind glass for display and protection.

wood.name: Wood Print
wood.description: Direct UV print on 3/16" Baltic Birch plywood. Multi-layer hardwood with superior rigidity. White and light areas reveal natural wood texture and grain.
wood.careInstructions: Soft microfiber cloth or damp cloth with non-ammonia cleaner

ru14.name: Birch Wood
ru14.description: Direct UV print on premium Russian birch plywood. Natural wood grain visible through lighter areas creates a unique organic warmth that no other medium can replicate.

builtin.name: Built-in Float Frame
builtin.description: 3/4-inch floating frame built into the back. Ready to hang out of the box. Included at no extra cost.

frenchcleat.name: French Cleat (upgrade)
frenchcleat.description: Heavy-duty angled bracket system. Recommended for prints over 36 inches.

standardFrames.note: Phase 4 — standard frames require mat calculation engine and Pictorem buildproductlist API integration
standardFrames.includes: 2-inch white border, wire backing, felt pads, glass

pricing.note: sizeInches = width * height in inches. Base size is 12x8 = 96 sq inches.
